summary: Replaces the elven Greatsword with the ebonyblade
descriptionHtml:
Please read*********************************
Changes the default model for the Elvengreatsword or elvensword to the ebonyblade or blades katana respectively. Allowing you to both smith and find on normal enemies, when you are further in the game weilding the katanas. This allows both easy access to the katanas and more customisation of them from an enchantment point of view.

(Please read the readme provided with the file for installation of custom textures)
(This mod has no texture when installed and will show up completely blue/purplish) 
Thank you!**************************************

Please don\'t forget to leave a comment and an endorsement if you like!

Any questions or problems please notify me right away!

Please feel free to submit your own pictures for this or any of my other submissions!

**************************************************************
If you like and download please endorse!
Constructive criticism is appreciated!
**************************************************************
author: kirkieball
